g:HTML.p: Use the slider below to set how many slides to shuffle through on the 2nd page. Also, setting a value greater than 5 will cause the FlipSwitch to be enabled.
The purpose of this demo is to only demonstrate the modified features to gwtmobile. Dennis has done a great job of demonstrating all other features. The modified features are:

ul.li: Page history: This demo enables the user to bookmark urls and jump directly to those pages. It also supports the browser's back and forward buttons. In this sample the no of slides are passed as history token params.
ButtonPanel: The buttons above have embedded images. I didn't have time to figure out why gwt widgets (eg. PushButton) was having its mouse events eaten by gwtmobile.
FlipSwitch: This widget didn't support the enable/disable property. The above switch will get enabled when the no of slides exceeds 5.
SlidePanel: The slide panel didn't support slide cycling. Now you can keep going next.
